text: Te, kotoryye postroili mechet' dlya naneseniya vreda, podderzhaniya neveriya, vneseniya raskola v ryady musul'man i sozdaniya zastavy dlya tekh, kto izdavna srazhayetsya protiv Allakha i Yego Poslannika, nepremenno budut klyast'sya: «My ne khoteli nichego, krome dobra». Allakh svidetel'stvuyet, chto oni yavlyayutsya lzhetsami
